verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%>, A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah<s%>. <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, thou hast been <S%H7521>favourable<s%> unto thy <S%H776>land<s%>: thou hast brought <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H7622%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H5375>forgiven<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, thou hast <S%H3680>covered<s%> all their <S%H2403>sin<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
Thou hast taken <S%H622>away<s%> all thy <S%H5678>wrath<s%>: thou hast <S%H7725>turned<s%> thyself from the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of thine <S%H639>anger<s%>.
<S%H7725>Turn<s%> us, O <S%H430>God<s%> of our <S%H3468>salvation<s%>, and cause thine <S%H3708>anger<s%> toward us to <S%H6565>cease<s%>.
Wilt thou be <S%H599>angry<s%> with us for <S%H5769>ever<s%>? wilt thou draw <S%H4900>out<s%> thine <S%H639>anger<s%> to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>?
Wilt thou not <S%H2421>revive<s%> us <S%H7725>again<s%>: that thy <S%H5971>people<s%> may <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in thee?
<S%H7200>Shew<s%> us thy <S%H2617>mercy<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H5414>grant<s%> us thy <S%H3468>salvation<s%>.

I will <S%H8085>hear<s%> what <S%H410>God<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H1696>speak<s%>: for he will <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> unto his <S%H5971>people<s%>, and to his <S%H2623>saints<s%>: but let them not turn <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3690>folly<s%>.
Surely his <S%H3468>salvation<s%> is <S%H7138>nigh<s%> them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> him; that <S%H3519>glory<s%> may <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in our <S%H776>land<s%>.
<S%H2617>Mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> are met <S%H6298>together<s%>; <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> and <S%H7965>peace<s%> have <S%H5401>kissed<s%> each other.
<S%H571>Truth<s%> shall spring <S%H6779>out<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; and <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> shall look <S%H8259>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.
Yea, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5414>give<s%> that which is <S%H2896>good<s%>; and our <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> her <S%H2981>increase<s%>.
<S%H6664>Righteousness<s%> shall <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him; and shall <S%H7760>set<s%> us in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of his <S%H6471>steps<s%>.
